description: Explicit format examples and use case guidance

search_hise.description:
Search across all HISE documentation: API methods, UI properties, module parameters, and code snippets.

USE THIS WHEN:
- You don't know the exact name
- You want to find items by keyword (e.g., "midi", "filter")
- You want to list all methods in a namespace (e.g., "Synth.*")

SUPPORTS: Keywords, prefix patterns (Synth.*), fuzzy matching
RETURNS: Array of matches with relevance scores

query_ui_property.description:
Get full details for a UI component property.

FORMAT: "ComponentType.propertyName"
EXAMPLES: "ScriptButton.filmstripImage", "ScriptSlider.mode", "ScriptLabel.text"

USE FOR: Properties accessed via .get("property") or .set("property", value)
RETURNS: Type, default value, description, possible values, related properties

query_scripting_api.description:
Get full details for a Scripting API method.

FORMAT: "Namespace.methodName" (parentheses optional)
EXAMPLES: "Synth.addNoteOn", "Math.round", "Engine.getSampleRate"

USE FOR: Any method/function calls in HiseScript code
RETURNS: Signature, parameters, return type, description, example, related methods

query_module_parameter.description:
Get full details for a module/processor parameter.

FORMAT: "ModuleType.ParameterId"
EXAMPLES: "SimpleEnvelope.Attack", "HardcodedSynth.Gain"

USE FOR: DSP module parameters accessed via setAttribute()
RETURNS: Min/max, step, default, description, related parameters

list_snippets.description:
Browse code snippets with optional filtering.

FILTERS: category, difficulty, tags
WORKFLOW: Browse here -> get ID -> use get_snippet for full code

get_snippet.description:
Get complete code snippet with source code.

INPUT: Snippet ID from list_snippets
RETURNS: Full code, related APIs, related components

list_ui_components.description: List all UI component types (ScriptButton, ScriptSlider, etc.)

list_scripting_namespaces.description: List all Scripting API namespaces (Synth, Engine, Math, etc.)

list_module_types.description: List all module/processor types (SimpleEnvelope, HardcodedSynth, etc.)
